SEARCH

Class StudentListTests

java.lang.Object
StudentListTests
class StudentListTests extends Object
This class contains unit tests for the StudentList model class. It tests various functionalities including adding, removing, editing, and searching students and their grades. It also checks for exceptions in edge cases like invalid grade values, formats, and indices.

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach void setUp()
      Sets up the testing environment before each test. Initializes a new StudentList object.

    • testInvalidGradeValueExceptionWasThrown

      @ParameterizedTest @CsvSource("1, Adrian, Reszka, 0, 0.5, Nowak, SMIW") void testInvalidGradeValueExceptionWasThrown(int id, String name, String surname, int gradeIndex, String gradeInput, String teacher, String subject)
      Tests that an InvalidGradeValueException is thrown when a grade with an invalid value is added.
      Parameters:
      id - Student ID.
      name - Student name.
      surname - Student surname.
      gradeIndex - Grade index (unused in this test).
      gradeInput - Invalid grade value as input.
      teacher - Teacher name.
      subject - Subject name.

    • testInvalidGradeValueExceptionWasNotThrown

      Tests that no exception is thrown when a valid grade value is added.

      surname - Student surname.
      gradeIndex - Grade index (unused in this test).
